channel.title: Business,More on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Business,More on TechnoStreet

item.title: Microsoft adds helicopters, gliders, Spruce Goose to its Flight Simulator
item.description: Microsoft adds helicopters, gliders, Spruce Goose to its Flight Simulator The Airbus A310-300, a real-life aeroplane, has carefully recreated as one of the update’s many features, the company said in a blogpost.

item.title: Disney set to reduce its workforce, freeze hiring
item.description: Disney set to reduce its workforce, freeze hiring According to an internal leaked memo from Disney CEO Bob Chapek, seen by CNBC, the company is “limiting headcount additions through a targeted hiring freeze”

item.title: Tesla opens its EV connector design to other automakers
item.description: Tesla opens its EV connector design to other automakers he Tesla charging connector, which combines AC charging and up to 1 mega-watt of DC in a “slim package”, is the most well-known connector in North America

item.title: Social media platforms Tumblr, Mastodon see meteoric rise amid shakeup at Twitter
item.description: Social media platforms Tumblr, Mastodon see meteoric rise amid shakeup at Twitter Twitter installs climbed 21 per cent, while alternatives like Mastodon grew 657 per cent in the 12 day from October 27 through November 7

item.title: Unemployment rate surges to 7.77% in October: CMIE data
item.description: Unemployment rate surges to 7.77% in October: CMIE data Unemployment rate in the country in October rose to 7.

item.title: Airline Indigo reports net loss of Rs 15,833 million in Q2 FY22-23
item.description: Airline Indigo reports net loss of Rs 15,833 million in Q2 FY22-23 Total income for the quarter ended September 2022 was Rs 128,523 million, an increase of 121.

item.title: Centre notifies scheme for funding PPP projects' development
item.description: Centre notifies scheme for funding PPP projects' development The IIPDF Scheme will aid the development of quality PPP projects by providing necessary funding support to the project sponsoring authorities

item.title: Indian stock indices largely steady today after the decline
item.description: Indian stock indices largely steady today after the decline The US Fed raised the key policy rate by 75 basis points to over a decade high at 3.

item.title: Housing sales in top 7 cities gain momentum in the ongoing Diwali festive period
item.description: Housing sales in top 7 cities gain momentum in the ongoing Diwali festive period As per the latest research by real estate consultancy firm Anarock, total sales in the top seven cities can exceed 3.

item.title: Indian Government receives dividends worth Rs 361 cr from Public Sector Undertakings (PSUs)
item.description: Indian Government receives dividends worth Rs 361 cr from Public Sector Undertakings (PSUs) Secretary in the department of investment and public asset management (DIPAM) Tuhin Kanta Pandey tweeted the details on his official Twitter account.

item.title: Second largest cryptocurrency Ethereum's dominance in crypto market up 20% after the 'Merge'
item.description: Second largest cryptocurrency Ethereum’s dominance in crypto market up 20% after the ‘Merge’ The ‘Merge’ last month will create a more energy-efficient network based on the second largest cryptocurrency with a promise to save the environment.
